projectPurpose: To provide a high-performance, columnar data format and storage layer specifically designed for Machine Learning (ML) and Large Language Models (LLMs), offering fast random access, integrated vector indexing, and data versioning.
mainFeatures: Compatible with Pandas, DuckDB, Polars, Pyarrow, and PyTorch

alternatives.name: Apache Parquet
mainFeatures: Widely integrated with big data frameworks

alternatives.name: Delta Lake
mainFeatures: Works on top of Parquet files

marketPositioning: Lance positions itself as a modern, high-performance columnar data format specifically for ML/LLM workflows, designed to overcome limitations of traditional formats like Parquet. Its key advantages are significantly faster random access, native integrated vector indexing, and built-in data versioning. It aims to be the foundational data layer for ML applications requiring both efficient data storage and integrated vector search capabilities, while maintaining compatibility with existing data science tools.
